mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed VALUES (feed_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{feedContent}, #{feedImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedImgs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{feedLoc}, sysdate, sysdate, #{feedLock})
mapper.select: SELECT feedNo FROM feed WHERE userId = #{userId} AND feedContent = #{feedContent} AND feedLoc = #{feedLoc} AND feedLock = #{feedLock}
